ActorFrame.OnCommand: % function(self) local width=136 local height=130 local thickness=3 self:GetChild('middle'):zoomtoheight(0) self:GetChild('middle'):zoomtowidth(width+thickness) self:GetChild('middle'):zoomtoheight(height+thickness) self:GetChild('top'):y(0) self:GetChild('top'):zoomtowidth(width+thickness) self:GetChild('top'):y(-height/2) self:GetChild('bottom'):y(0) self:GetChild('bottom'):zoomtowidth(width+thickness) self:GetChild('bottom'):y(height/2) self:GetChild('left'):zoomtoheight(0) self:GetChild('left'):x(-width/2) self:GetChild('left'):zoomtoheight(height+thickness) self:GetChild('right'):zoomtoheight(0) self:GetChild('right'):x(width/2) self:GetChild('right'):zoomtoheight(height+thickness) end
